snippet: A CNN national security analyst documents the operation that led to the killing of Osama bin Laden.
abstract: Michiko Kakutani reviews book Manhunt: The Ten-Year Search for Bin Laden From 9/11 to Abbottabad by Peter L Bergen.
lead_paragraph: A CNN national security analyst documents the operation that led to the killing of Osama bin Laden.
